finding_description: VM instance has scopes granting full API access (cloud-platform scope)
remediation: Reconfigure the instance to use specific API scopes instead of cloud-platform

finding_description: VM instance has an external public IP address assigned
remediation: Consider using Cloud NAT or a load balancer instead of direct public IP

finding_description: Shielded VM secure boot is not enabled on this instance
remediation: Enable secure boot in the shielded VM configuration

finding_description: GKE cluster has public endpoint exposed
remediation: Enable private cluster mode to restrict access to the control plane

finding_description: Workload Identity is not enabled on this GKE cluster
remediation: Enable Workload Identity for secure service account management

finding_description: Storage bucket has public access configured
remediation: Remove public access and use signed URLs or IAM for access control

finding_description: Firewall rule allows SSH (port 22) from any IP address (0.0.0.0/0)
remediation: Restrict SSH access to specific IP ranges or use IAP for SSH

finding_description: Firewall rule allows RDP (port 3389) from any IP address (0.0.0.0/0)
remediation: Restrict RDP access to specific IP ranges or disable if not needed

finding_description: Cloud SQL instance has a public IP address enabled
remediation: Use private IP with VPC peering for secure database access

finding_description: Cloud SQL instance does not require SSL for connections
remediation: Enable SSL requirement in instance settings

finding_description: Cloud SQL instance allows connections from any IP (0.0.0.0/0)
remediation: Restrict authorized networks to specific IP ranges

finding_description: Automatic backups are not enabled for this Cloud SQL instance
remediation: Enable automatic backups with appropriate retention

finding_description: Virtual Trusted Platform Module is not enabled
remediation: Enable vTPM for enhanced security monitoring

finding_description: Integrity monitoring is not enabled on this shielded VM
remediation: Enable integrity monitoring to detect boot-level rootkits

finding_description: OS Login is not enabled for centralized SSH key management
remediation: Enable OS Login at project or instance level
